channel.title: [PI] A Lot Question, Please help!
channel.description:
1. How can i change the location of teleport spell ?
2. How can I add the "hp" and "prayer" near the minimap ? I need to see the skill page to check my hp :/
3. How can i remove object ? e.g. Bank booth.
4. How can I Add more pk area ? e.g. I want to make al kharid to be pk area too :)
5. In the wilderless, I want to add some words on the screen in the specific area,e.g. "you r in pk area " like this.
6. Any1 can code me PI castle war as i cannot find it :(
7. How can i make npc walk ?

Can u teach me how to use the code ? I m new to server

item.title: [PI] A Lot Question, Please help!
item.dc:creator: @Cres Cres
item.description:
@Cres wrote:

deathnote777:

I mean can i add a ladder with different ID ? Cuz If I have 2 ladder with same ID, I will go to the same position after clicking any of them…

if (objectx == this && objecty == this) { doShit(); } else if (objectx == this && objecty == this) { doOtherShit(); }

item.title: [PI] A Lot Question, Please help!
item.dc:creator: @I_InDrEk_I I InDrEk I
item.description:
@I_InDrEk_I wrote:

[quote=“deathnote777, post:3, topic:385306”]Thx , How about if I want to add object ?

And, there are many ladder, portal ingame… If i want to add add some position after clicking the ladder, i need to go to actionhandler, right ? But is the ID of all the ladders different ? Can I add new ladder with new ID so that different ladder can teleport me to different place.[/quote]Ehh, yes and id’s are different. For adding object just need to remove the -1 c.getPA().checkObjectSpawn(ObjectID, CoordX, CoordY, Height, 10);

Read full topic

item.title: [PI] A Lot Question, Please help!
item.dc:creator: @I_InDrEk_I I InDrEk I
item.description:
@I_InDrEk_I wrote:

  1. You can change the teleports in ClickingButtons.java by searching for the coords of the

teleport: Example you want to change the PK Teleport so ingame teleport there and right

then(dont move) type in ::mypos and coords should come in the chat box. Now search them in

the ClickingButtons.java and replace them with your new coords. Also if you have much

teleports in one page(that what appears in chatbox) and you want to change the name of

teleport then look for the name in ClickingButtons.java and change it. Example i have line:

[code]c.getDH().sendOption5(“Varrock Wild”, “Graveyard”, “44 Portals”, “Greater Demons”,

“Ardy Lever”);[/code] So i want to change the first teleport then i edit the "Varrock

Wild".

  1. To do it, im not sure but you need to get new game frame and sprites and then you need

to make them work by adding some methods.

  1. Go to ObjectManager.java

Then look for:

Under it add this:

-1 = That means you are removing the object.

Now the “ObjectID” = Id of the object you want to spawn, (example: 2213 - bank booth)

Object X = Coord X of the place

Object Y = Coord Y of the place
Height = The Height level - this is where the object is 0=Ground -1 = Underground 1=First

floor 2= Second floor and so on…Btw, not sure about them but if you want to spawn it on

ground just use 0.

10 = Dont know about it just leave it as it is.

Read full topic
